      • isCovered

        public boolean isCovered()
        Returns whether or not the shift is covered.

        The SLC needs only one person to open; the HSC needs only one person at all times; and SLC daytime and MLC need two people at all times.

        Returns:

      • overlapsClass

        public boolean overlapsClass(Shift c)
        Returns whether or not the Shift overlaps with a specified class period. This assumes that the employee can make it to the location in the 15 minute break between classes.
        Parameters:
        c - The Shift denoting the class time in question
        Returns:

      • overlapsShift

        public boolean overlapsShift(Shift s)
        Returns whether or not the Shift overlaps with another Shift. This assumes that the employee will not be able to make an adjacent shift at a different location
        Parameters:
        s - The Shift in question
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Shift overlaps with the other Shift, false if otherwise

      • overlapsShift

        public boolean overlapsShift(java.util.ArrayList<Shift> arr)
        Returns whether or not the Shift overlaps with any Shift in an ArrayList of Shifts
        Parameters:
        arr - The ArrayList of Shifts in question
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Shift overlaps with any of the Shifts in the ArrayList, false if otherwise
